title: Prototype for a space heater
provenance: Bill Moggridge, 1973-2010; given to CHNDM by Bill Moggridge, 2010.
medium: Sheet metal, aluminum, phenolic compression molding, wood
description: Bright red minimal rectangular form; slightly undulating top panel and accordion-like vents visible from three sides; low, black rectangular base.
name: Prototype for a space heater
